display_long_description:
#  ✨ HUGE UPDATE! NEW CONTENT & FEATURES!

17 New Low-Difficulty Tracks: We've added 17 new dance tracks, including 8 fundamental technique tutorials covering various dance styles to help beginners ease into the rhythm!

Quick Start in Room: Your Room is now a full dance scene! You can start any track directly in your room without needing to switch to a separate studio or stage, allowing for instant, convenient play.

Dance Eden is a VR/MR dance game where you can dance alone or with other players, following the lead dancer in real-time.

#  💃 A variety of dance styles
77 dance tracks are provided, with different styles, and each song comes in two difficulty levels—Regular and Hard.

#  🎵 Immersive music and dance environments
Dance practice rooms, stages, even in rooms.
[media]
#  🎮 Multiple dance modes
You can choose to have the lead dancer face you while dancing together, or have them face away from you, dancing towards a mirror.

#  ✨ Personalized outfits
The game offers a vast array of carefully crafted clothing and makeup options for you to combine and match, allowing you to fully express your individual charm.
[media]
#  🎵 A Note on Music
As an independent studio, we cannot afford the high cost of popular music licensing. However, we have carefully selected rhythmically engaging music perfectly suited for dance and fitness. Thank you for your understanding and support!

Quick Start in Room: Your Room is now a full dance scene! You can start any track directly in your room without needing to switch to a separate studio or stage, allowing for instant, convenient play.

Dance Eden is a VR/MR dance game where you can dance alone or with other players, following the lead dancer in real-time.

#  💃 A variety of dance styles
77 dance tracks are provided, with different styles, and each song comes in two difficulty levels—Regular and Hard.

#  🎵 Immersive music and dance environments
Dance practice rooms, stages, even in rooms.

#  🎵 A Note on Music
As an independent studio, we cannot afford the high cost of popular music licensing. However, we have carefully selected rhythmically engaging music perfectly suited for dance and fitness. Thank you for your understanding and support!
